name: Lula Woodard
text: Not enthused about the visit. Nothing good or bad to say. Customer service was ok, but could have been better.

name: Skeet Johnson
text: Disappointed!!! I'm disabled and I had to get  my Family member to Help clean the nasty table before eating that wasn't ready even after waiting patiently!!! When it was all sayed and done the manager never rectified  the problem!!! God bless!!!

name: Georgia Mahaffey
text: Extremely rude employees. Pizza was cold and toppings were very minimal.

name: Tiney Anderson
text: My experience at Pizza Hut.  My group and I sit there for an hour.  Still did not get wait on.  We took our business to Donmino Pizza.  Service only took 15 minutes and the food was hot and delicious!!

name: Myz WHITE
text: I wish I could give negative stars. Tables were disgusting. Waitress inattentive. No silverware, straws, or napkins given. No variety on buffet. Same pizza each time they did bring any out and it was only like 1-2 so there was a rat race to get pizza.

name: Regina Brock
text: I love Pizza Hut, but the I went to last was not a good experience. We were not allowed to be seated because they were short staffed. I came very close to calling Mike Retzer because the girl that was telling us this was rude.

name: Tenisha Sanders
text: Worst pizza hut ever. Either no delivery drivers or it's just one so you have to wait almost 2 hours for you food. Very terrible

name: Fashundra Jones
text: CUSTOMER SERVICE SUCKS AND TYE EMPLOYEES ACT SLOW...

name: Sam Porter Bridges
text:
I couldn't understand the person on the phone because his accent was so thick.
It was like talking to someone that didn't speak English.
I was born in Texas and raised in California and I'm half Asian. So I'm used to a thick accents, but this was intense. I really hope I get my food.

name: Kempton MacLeod
text: Good and reasonably priced pizza!

name: Bobbie Hyde
text: There ok to eat if you like sweet sauce.

name: Cotton & Delta Blues
text: Went for buffet. They brought out very little pizza. Paid for this trash even after telling the lady, we hardly got food and then went somewhere else to eat. She didn't even care. Never have gone back.

name: Vonetta Burks
text: Very nice ladies, had an amazing experience.

name: Theresa Causey
text: 10+ always hot and fresh never disappointed.  We eat there at least once a week.

name: Symone Prince
text: Great employees and delivery team....I think they should add a tip account online for those using card....it's winter make sure u give these guys a tip for there service

name: Andrea Allen
text: I had the worst experience today. After being put on hold three separate times, and still having to come in the restaurant to order our food, they managed to put my pre paid pizza in the carry out slot and almost 45 min later, brought me â€¦More

name: Charles Arnold

name: Tanita Wright
text: This place is horrible. I understand its the 1st of rhe month but man come on be professional. Too many young kids working here on a friday night.

name: Angie Rosignol
text: Worst pizza hut ever! Order over $50 worth of food after waiting 20 minutes on the phone to get order made then told no driver to deliver after already charging credit card. You need to get training on how to run a business, how to answer a â€¦More

name: Angela Holmes
text: Ordered delivery pizza at 11:10, the email stated would receive pizza at 11:40. At 11:51 pizza hut called and said we are sorry we don't have a delivery driver. My husband said well can we pick up in the drive through, she said yes. Sent â€¦More

text: Its a hit and miss order. Mostly orders are okay. Never recive a order as advertised

text: I love the friendly service and delicious food.

name: J. Fleming
text: They have the worst service, cold food, waited an hour to receive my order of wings never suggested anything while waiting nor did they offer any complimentary items. #Fail

text:
Well, even after reading reviews I ordered delivery. 5 minutes Later I get a call "we don't have a delivery driver".
At least I said cash so I didn't have to fight that battle.
